The magic fancy tech going on in the background isn't a fantastic predictor of how successful a *token* will be. The amount of people building on your network also isn't necessarily an indicator of the value of your token. That being said, there are some projects out there whose tech is head and shoulders above its 'competitors', and that would be a good indicator *now* for the success of the network (and thus the value of the token) *later*.
